languages.text: {n}Хрустнув затекшей от многочасового чтения документов шеей, Инцендия берет в руки новый лист. Тут и там вы замечаете слуг, сгибающихся под тяжелыми стопками все новых и новых доносов, документов и приговоров.{/n}

{n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хрустнув затекшей от многочасового чтения документов шеей, Инцендия берет в руки новый лист. Тут и там вы замечаете слуг, сгибающихся под тяжелыми стопками все новых и новых доносов, документов и приговоров.{/n}

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅转了转脖子。读了这么久的卷宗，她的脖子肯定已经发僵了。随后，她又拿起了另一卷卷宗。无论你看向哪里，都只能看到一群仆人，手里拿着成堆的告发书、逮捕令与其他文件，累得上气不接下气。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅转了转脖子。读了这么久的卷宗，她的脖子肯定已经发僵了。随后，她又拿起了另一卷卷宗。无论你看向哪里，都只能看到一群仆人，手里拿着成堆的告发书、逮捕令与其他文件，累得上气不接下气。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは何時間もの読書で強張ったらしい首をゴリゴリと鳴らし、次の書類を拾い上げる。どこを見渡しても、使用人たちが新しい糾弾状や令状、その他の書類の重たい山に苦戦している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは何時間もの読書で強張ったらしい首をゴリゴリと鳴らし、次の書類を拾い上げる。どこを見渡しても、使用人たちが新しい糾弾状や令状、その他の書類の重たい山に苦戦している。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia se cruje el cuello, que se le debe haber entumecido después de tantas horas seguidas leyendo. Después coge otra hoja. Mires donde mires, los sirvientes nadan entre pilas pesadas de nuevas denuncias, órdenes judiciales y otros documentos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia se cruje el cuello, que se le debe haber entumecido después de tantas horas seguidas leyendo. Luego coge otra hoja. Mires donde mires, los sirvientes nadan entre pilas pesadas de nuevas denuncias, órdenes judiciales y otros documentos.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia lässt ihren Hals knacken, der nach so vielen Stunden des Lesens steif geworden sein muss. Dann nimmt sie ein neues Blatt in die Hand. Wohin du auch blickst, ächzen Diener unter schweren Stapeln von neuen Anklageschriften, Handelsbriefen und anderen Dokumenten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia lässt ihren Hals knacken, der nach so vielen Stunden des Lesens steif geworden sein muss. Dann nimmt sie ein neues Blatt in die Hand. Wohin du auch blickst, ächzen Diener unter schweren Stapeln von neuen Anklageschriften, Handelsbriefen und anderen Dokumenten.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia fait craquer son cou que plusieurs heures de lecture ont dû crisper, puis elle prend une autre feuille. Tout autour de vous, des serviteurs croulent sous des piles de dénonciations, de mandats et d'autres documents du même type.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia fait craquer son cou que plusieurs heures de lecture ont dû crisper, puis elle prend une autre feuille. Tout autour de vous, des serviteurs croulent sous des piles de dénonciations, de mandats et d'autres documents du même type.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia boynunu kütletiyor. Saatler boyunca bir şeyler okuyor oluşu nedeniyle kaskatı kesilmiş olmalı. Ardından bir başka sayfayı eline alıyor. Her yanında hizmetkârlar; yeni suç duyurularından, tutuklama emirlerinden ve diğer dokümanlardan oluşan ağır balyaların içine gömülmüş hâlde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck, which must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading, before picking up another sheet. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia boynunu kütletiyor. Saatler boyunca bir şeyler okuyor oluşu nedeniyle kaskatı olmuş olmalı. Ardından eline bir başka sayfa alıyor. Her ne yöne bakarsan bak, hizmetkârlar, yeni suç duyurularından, tutuklama emirlerinden ve diğer dokümanlardan oluşan ağır balyaların içine gömülmüş hâldeler."{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
